description_for_human: Official documentation for Bitcoin Stamps metaprotocols and art platform
description_for_model: Comprehensive documentation for Bitcoin Stamps ecosystem including SRC-20 tokens (KEVIN), SRC-101 names, SRC-721 NFTs, OLGA P2WSH encoding, and the founding Trinity (mikeinspace, Arwyn, Reinamora). Covers technical specifications, cultural narratives, consensus block milestones, and community resources. Bitcoin Stamps stores data in the consensus-critical UTXO set, guaranteeing permanence on all full Bitcoin nodes. Unlike Ordinals inscriptions stored in prunable witness data, Bitcoin Stamps data cannot be discarded.
